scenario: "Gather customer feedback from our website, analyze the sentiments expressed, and generate a report summarizing the key insights along with visualizations to highlight major trends."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  customer_feedback_data:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather customer feedback from the website"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_null_values: [feedback_text]"
      - "length > 0"

  analyzed_sentiment_data:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze sentiments expressed in customer feedback"
    type: model
    inputs: [customer_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [feedback_text]"

  sentiment_summary_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a report summarizing key insights from sentiment analysis"
    type: table
    inputs: [analyzed_sentiment_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight, sentiment_score, feedback_count]"

  sentiment_trend_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualizations to highlight major sentiment trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [sentiment_summary_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Search for the latest customer feedback on our product using DuckDuckGo, compile the findings into a structured summary, and visualize the sentiment trends over the past month."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  customer_feedback_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract the latest customer feedback on the product from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  structured_feedback_summary:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine URL content from customer feedback into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [customer_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= customer_feedback_data.row_count * 0.9"
      - "columns: [summary, sentiment_score, url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary, sentiment_score]"

  sentiment_trend_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual representation of sentiment trends over the past month"
    type: image
    inputs: [structured_feedback_summary]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [width: 1920, height: 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather user feedback from our website, analyze the sentiment of the comments, and then create a report summarizing the key insights along with visualizations of the sentiment trends."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  user_feedback_data:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather user feedback comments from the website"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [comments]"

  sentiment_analysis_results:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze user feedback for sentiment and extract patterns"
    type: model
    inputs: [user_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.75"
      - "required_features: [text_length, sentiment_score]"

  sentiment_summary_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine sentiment analysis results into a comprehensive summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary, key_insights]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  sentiment_trends_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualization of sentiment trends over time"
    type: image
    inputs: [sentiment_summary_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [width: 800, height: 600]"

scenario: "Gather customer feedback from our support tickets, analyze the sentiments to identify trends, and generate a visually appealing report summarizing the findings for our monthly review meeting."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  customer_support_tickets:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract customer feedback from support ticket documents"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "non_empty: true"
      - "no_null_values: [customer_id, feedback_text]"

  sentiment_analysis_results:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze sentiments from customer feedback to identify trends"
    type: model
    inputs: [customer_support_tickets]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.75"
      - "required_features: [feedback_text, customer_id]"

  sentiment_trends_report:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual report summarizing sentiment trends for review"
    type: image
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather recent news articles about renewable energy, extract relevant information on new technologies from the top five articles, and generate a concise summary table highlighting the key points."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  recent_news_articles:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent news articles about renewable energy"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, publication_date, summary]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  extracted_technology_info:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract relevant information on new technologies from the top five articles"
    type: text
    inputs: [recent_news_articles]
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [text_content]"

  summary_table:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a concise summary table highlighting key points from the extracted information"
    type: table
    inputs: [extracted_technology_info]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [key_point, article_reference]"
      - "no_empty_values: [key_point, article_reference]"

scenario: "Gather the latest articles on climate change from both DuckDuckGo and Brave, combine the insights into a structured summary table, and then generate a visual infographic to present the key findings."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  duckduckgo_climate_articles:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract latest articles on climate change from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  brave_climate_articles:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract latest articles on climate change from Brave"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  combined_climate_articles_summary:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine articles from DuckDuckGo and Brave into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [duckduckgo_climate_articles, brave_climate_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count == duckduckgo_climate_articles.row_count + brave_climate_articles.row_count"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title]"

  climate_insights_infographic:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Generate a visual infographic presenting key findings on climate change"
    type: image
    inputs: [combined_climate_articles_summary]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [width: 1920, height: 1080]"
      - "format: png"

    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"

      - "no_empty_values: [summary, article_reference]"

    description: "Validate nutritional information for each recipe"

    checks:

  recipe_infographic:

    description: "Create infographic summarizing the validated recipes"

    inputs: [validated_recipes_data]
    checks:

    checks:

      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Compile a report on the latest market trends in renewable energy, pulling data from various online sources, validating the information, and creating visual infographics to summarize the findings."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  market_trend_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract market trends data from DuckDuckGo search results"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant chunks from document collections about renewable energy"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"
      - "length > 100"

  validated_market_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean the market trend data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [market_trend_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= market_trend_data.row_count * 0.90"
      - "no_null_values: [title, snippet]"

  structured_trend_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform unstructured text into structured market trend tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [document_chunks]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [trend, date, impact]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend, date]"

  combined_trend_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine validated market data and structured trend data into a comprehensive report"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_market_data, structured_trend_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 1"
      - "columns: [trend, date, impact, source]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend, date, impact]"

  trend_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual infographic summarizing market trends in renewable energy"
    type: image
    inputs: [combined_trend_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [width >= 800, height >= 600]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Retrieve the latest reviews for our product from both DuckDuckGo and Brave, extract sentiment patterns from the reviews, and generate a visual report summarizing the key insights and trends."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  duckduckgo_reviews:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Retrieve the latest product reviews from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, review_text, sentiment_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [review_text]"

  brave_reviews:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Retrieve the latest product reviews from Brave"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, review_text, sentiment_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [review_text]"

  combined_reviews:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine reviews from DuckDuckGo and Brave into a unified summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [duckduckgo_reviews, brave_reviews]
    checks:
      - "row_count == duckduckgo_reviews.row_count + brave_reviews.row_count"
      - "columns: [review_id, review_text, sentiment_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [review_text]"

  sentiment_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze review data to extract sentiment patterns and create a model"
    type: model
    inputs: [combined_reviews]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [review_text, sentiment_score]"

  sentiment_insights_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Generate a visual report summarizing sentiment insights and trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [combined_reviews]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "format: png"

      - "no_null_values: [review_id, review_text]"

  internal_survey_results:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Pull internal customer survey results from document collection"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "length > 0"
      - "contains: [feedback, satisfaction_score]"

  structured_feedback:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform internal survey results into structured feedback table"
    type: table
    inputs: [internal_survey_results]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [customer_id, feedback, satisfaction_score]"
      - "satisfaction_score between 1 and 10"

  combined_feedback:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine online reviews and structured feedback into comprehensive insights"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_online_reviews, structured_feedback]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, customer_name, feedback, combined_rating]"

  validated_feedback:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate combined feedback for consistency and accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_feedback]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_feedback.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [feedback, combined_rating]"

  feedback_trends_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualization chart showing trends from validated feedback"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_feedback]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Compile recent articles on climate change from DuckDuckGo and Brave, extract key statistics and insights, validate the findings, and create a detailed report with visual summaries and actionable recommendations."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  recent_articles_duckduckgo:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent articles on climate change from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  recent_articles_brave:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent articles on climate change from Brave"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  combined_articles:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine articles from DuckDuckGo and Brave into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_articles_duckduckgo, recent_articles_brave]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= recent_articles_duckduckgo.row_count + recent_articles_brave.row_count"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet, source]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  key_statistics_insights:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Extract key statistics and insights from combined articles"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [statistic, value, context]"
      - "no_empty_values: [statistic, value]"

  validated_insights:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean extracted insights for accuracy and relevance"
    type: table
    inputs: [key_statistics_insights]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= key_statistics_insights.row_count * 0.95"
      - "valid_values: [value]"
      - "no_empty_values: [statistic]"

  climate_change_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Compile a detailed report with insights and actionable recommendations"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_insights]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [recommendation, context, impact]"
      - "no_empty_values: [recommendation]" 

  insights_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual summaries of key insights from the report"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_insights]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1200, 800]"
      - "format: png"

assets:
  user_feedback_responses:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather user feedback from the website"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_text]"
  
  structured_feedback_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Convert user feedback text into structured tabular format"
    type: table
    inputs: [user_feedback_responses]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [user_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score]"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"
  
  validated_feedback_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean structured feedback data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [structured_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= structured_feedback_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_empty_values: [user_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score]"
  
  sentiment_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze feedback data to create a sentiment analysis model"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [feedback_text, sentiment_score]"
      - "model_type: classification"
  
  sentiment_trends_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual report of sentiment trends over time"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [width: 1280, height: 720]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive report on the latest trends in renewable energy by gathering data from various research papers and web sources, analyze the data for patterns, validate the findings, and create an interactive infographic that highlights the key insights."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  renewable_energy_research_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract data from DuckDuckGo on renewable energy research"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet, publication_date]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant chunks from renewable energy research documents"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "length > 100"
      - "no_empty_chunks: true"

  combined_research_summary:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine summaries from multiple URLs into a structured format"
    type: table
    inputs: [document_chunks]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [url, summary, relevance_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [url, summary]"

  structured_data_from_text:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform the combined research summary text into structured tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_research_summary]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [title, data_points]"
      - "data_points: numeric"

  validated_energy_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean the structured renewable energy data"
    type: table
    inputs: [structured_data_from_text]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= structured_data_from_text.row_count * 0.95"
      - "data_points between 0 and 100"
      - "no_null_values: [title, data_points]"

  renewable_energy_trend_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze and create a model predicting renewable energy trends"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_energy_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [data_points, title]"

  renewable_energy_trends_infographic:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Generate an interactive infographic highlighting key insights from the model"
    type: image
    inputs: [renewable_energy_trend_model]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather customer feedback from our online surveys, analyze sentiment trends across different demographics, extract key insights, and generate a comprehensive report with visualizations to guide our product development strategy."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  customer_feedback_data:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather customer feedback from online surveys"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_text]"
      - "length > 0"

  sentiment_analysis_table:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze sentiment trends across different demographics"
    type: table
    inputs: [customer_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [demographic, sentiment_score, feedback_count]"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"

  validated_sentiment_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean sentiment analysis data"
    type: table
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= sentiment_analysis_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [demographic, sentiment_score]"

  insights_summary_table:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Extract key insights from validated sentiment data"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_sentiment_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight, trend, recommendation]"

  insights_visualization_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of insights summary"
    type: image
    inputs: [insights_summary_table]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "format: png"
      - "dimensions: [width >= 800, height >= 600]"

scenario: "Gather user feedback on our latest product release from various online platforms, extract and analyze sentiment trends, validate the data for consistency, and create a comprehensive report with visualizations highlighting key insights and suggestions for improvement."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  user_feedback_data:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather user feedback on the latest product release from various online platforms"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_content]"
      - "length > 0"

  online_feedback_text:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract relevant feedback text from document collections"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_chunk]"
      - "length >= 10"

  sentiment_analysis_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Analyze feedback text and extract sentiment trends into structured tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [user_feedback_data, online_feedback_text]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [feedback_id, sentiment_score, feedback_text]"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"

  validated_sentiment_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and ensure consistency of sentiment analysis data"
    type: table
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= sentiment_analysis_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [sentiment_score, feedback_text]"

  comprehensive_report_table:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Create a comprehensive report based on validated sentiment data"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_sentiment_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [report_id, insights, suggestions]"
      - "no_empty_values: [insights, suggestions]"

  insights_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualizations highlighting key insights from the report"
    type: image
    inputs: [comprehensive_report_table]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Gather user feedback from our website, analyze the sentiment, extract relevant themes, and generate a report with visualizations to present at the upcoming stakeholder meeting."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  user_feedback_data:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather user feedback from the website"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_text]"
      - "feedback_text_length >= 10"

  sentiment_analysis_results:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze user feedback for sentiment"
    type: model
    inputs: [user_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [feedback_text]"

  theme_extraction_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Extract relevant themes from user feedback"
    type: table
    inputs: [user_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [theme, frequency]"
      - "no_null_values: [theme]"

  validated_themes_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and refine extracted themes"
    type: table
    inputs: [theme_extraction_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= theme_extraction_data.row_count * 0.90"
      - "frequency >= 1"

  themes_summary_table:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine URL content to summarize themes"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_themes_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [theme, description]"
      - "no_empty_values: [description]"

  themes_visualization_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual representation of user feedback themes"
    type: image
    inputs: [themes_summary_table]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [800, 600]"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive analysis of our customer feedback from various online platforms, extract the key themes and sentiments, validate the findings against our internal reports, and generate a visual summary report to present at the next board meeting."

    checks:

  combined_feedback_text:

    inputs: [customer_feedback_data, document_chunks]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary_id, combined_text]"

  validated_feedback_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and analyze combined feedback data for accuracy"

    inputs: [combined_feedback_text]
    checks:

  visual_summary_report:

    inputs: [validated_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"

      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather user feedback from our latest product launch, analyze sentiment through various social media platforms, extract key themes from the feedback, and create a comprehensive report with visualizations to present to the product team."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  user_feedback:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather user feedback from the latest product launch"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback]"
  
  social_media_feedback:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract sentiment analysis from social media platforms"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [platform, sentiment_score, feedback_text]"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"

  combined_feedback:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine user feedback and social media sentiment analysis"
    type: table
    inputs: [user_feedback, social_media_feedback]
    checks:
      - "row_count = user_feedback.row_count + social_media_feedback.row_count"
      - "columns: [source, sentiment_score, feedback_text]"
  
  key_themes:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Extract key themes from combined feedback data"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_feedback]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [theme, frequency]"
  
  validated_themes:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean extracted themes for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [key_themes]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= key_themes.row_count * 0.9"
      - "no_empty_values: [theme]"

  comprehensive_report:
    agent: ToolAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive report based on validated themes"
    type: json
    inputs: [validated_themes]
    checks:
      - "valid_json: true"
      - "required_keys: [report_title, themes_summary, timestamp]"

  theme_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of key themes"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_themes]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [800, 600]"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive market analysis report by gathering recent industry articles and trends from multiple search engines, extracting key points and statistics, validating the data, and visualizing the results in an interactive format."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  recent_industry_articles:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent industry articles from DuckDuckGo search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  additional_articles:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract additional industry articles from Brave search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  combined_articles:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine article summaries into a structured table"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_industry_articles, additional_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count == recent_industry_articles.row_count + additional_articles.row_count"
      - "columns: [title, url, summary]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, summary]"

  validated_articles:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate articles for relevance and accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_articles.row_count * 0.9"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, summary]"
      - "summary_length > 50"

  market_trends_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Extract key statistics and trends from validated articles"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [trend, percentage_change, source]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend, percentage_change]"

  trends_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze trends data to create predictive model"
    type: model
    inputs: [market_trends_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [trend, percentage_change]"

  market_analysis_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of market analysis trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [market_trends_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

      - "row_count > 0"

    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [source, summary, relevance_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [source, summary]"

    inputs: [combined_text_data]

    description: "Gather recent articles on climate change impacts from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  climate_data_statistics:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract statistics on climate change impacts from Brave Search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [statistic, source, date]"
      - "no_empty_values: [statistic, source]"

  combined_climate_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine articles and statistics into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_climate_articles, climate_data_statistics]
    checks:
      - "row_count == recent_climate_articles.row_count + climate_data_statistics.row_count"
      - "columns: [title, url, statistic, source]"

  validated_climate_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined climate data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_climate_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_climate_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [title, statistic]"

  climate_impact_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze validated climate data to create predictive model"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_climate_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [statistic, date]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  climate_visualization_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualization for climate impact findings"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_climate_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

  comprehensive_climate_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive report with findings and visualizations"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_climate_data, climate_visualization_chart]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 1"
      - "columns: [summary, visualization_url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

      - "columns: [title, url, snippet, date]"

      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant chunks from renewable energy documents"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "non_empty: true"

  extracted_statistics:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform document chunks into structured statistical tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [document_chunks]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [statistic_name, value, year]"
      - "no_null_values: [statistic_name, value]"

  validated_statistics:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean the extracted statistics for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [extracted_statistics]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= extracted_statistics.row_count * 0.95"
      - "value >= 0"

  growth_forecast_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a predictive model to forecast growth in renewable energy"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_statistics]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [statistic_name, value, year]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  growth_forecast_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Visualize the growth forecast in a comprehensive chart"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_statistics]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Gather recent climate data from various sources, analyze and validate the information, create a predictive model for temperature trends over the next decade, and generate a comprehensive report with visualizations for presentation."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  recent_climate_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent climate data from DuckDuckGo search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [date, temperature, location, condition]"
      - "temperature is not null"
  
  retrieved_document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant chunks of climate-related documents"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "length > 1000"
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"

  combined_climate_info:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine URL content into structured summaries of climate data"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_climate_data, retrieved_document_chunks]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary, source, relevance_score]"

  validated_climate_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Analyze and validate combined climate data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_climate_info]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_climate_info.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [summary, source]"

  temperature_trend_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a predictive model for temperature trends over the next decade"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_climate_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [date, temperature, location]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  temperature_trend_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualization of predicted temperature trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [temperature_trend_model]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
  
  final_climate_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive report with visualizations for presentation"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_climate_data, temperature_trend_visualization]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [report_section, content]"

scenario: "Gather feedback from our customer surveys stored in various documents, analyze the data for sentiment and key themes, and create a detailed report with visualizations highlighting trends and suggestions for improvement."
workflow_yaml:
assets:

  feedback_sentiment_analysis:

    type: model
    inputs: [customer_feedback_documents]

  sentiment_summary_table:

      - "columns: [theme, sentiment_score, feedback_count]"

  validated_sentiment_data:

scenario: "Conduct a market research analysis by gathering recent product reviews from both DuckDuckGo and Brave search engines, extracting key insights and trends from the data, validating the results, and creating a comprehensive report with visual summaries to present to the marketing team."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  product_review_data_duckduckgo:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent product reviews from DuckDuckGo search engine"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, product_name, review_text, rating]"
      - "no_empty_values: [product_name, review_text, rating]"
      - "rating between 1 and 5"

  product_review_data_brave:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent product reviews from Brave search engine"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, product_name, review_text, rating]"
      - "no_empty_values: [product_name, review_text, rating]"
      - "rating between 1 and 5"

  combined_product_reviews:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine product reviews from both search engines into a unified summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [product_review_data_duckduckgo, product_review_data_brave]
    checks:
      - "row_count = product_review_data_duckduckgo.row_count + product_review_data_brave.row_count"
      - "columns: [review_id, product_name, review_text, rating]"

  validated_product_reviews:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined product reviews for inconsistencies"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_product_reviews]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_product_reviews.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_empty_values: [product_name, review_text, rating]"
      - "rating between 1 and 5"

  insights_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive insights report based on validated product reviews"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_product_reviews]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [product_name, average_rating, total_reviews, insights_summary]"

  insights_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual summaries of insights report for presentation"
    type: image
    inputs: [insights_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [width: 1920, height: 1080]"

scenario: "Gather recent articles and studies related to renewable energy technologies from the web and academic databases, extract key statistics and trends, analyze the data for patterns, validate the findings, and present the results in an interactive visualization dashboard."

      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

    inputs: [validated_statistics_data]

  interactive_visualization_dashboard:

      - "columns: [competitor_name, market_share, strengths, weaknesses]"
      - "no_null_values: [competitor_name]"

scenario: "Gather customer feedback from multiple online reviews, extract key insights from the data, validate the findings against our internal survey results, and generate a comprehensive report with visualizations highlighting sentiment trends over the past year."
workflow_yaml:

    checks:

    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent

    checks:
      - "row_count >= online_reviews_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [feedback_summary, sentiment_score]"

  validated_feedback:

    description: "Validate and clean combined feedback for consistency and accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_feedback]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_feedback.row_count * 0.90"
      - "no_null_values: [feedback_summary, sentiment_score]"

  sentiment_trend_chart:

    description: "Generate a visual chart representing sentiment trends over the past year"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_feedback]
    checks:

      - "format: png"

    inputs: [validated_sentiment_results]
    checks:

scenario: "Conduct a market analysis by pulling recent competitor pricing data from both Brave and DuckDuckGo, validate and synthesize the findings into a comprehensive table, then train a machine learning model to predict future pricing trends, and finally create a visual report summarizing the analysis."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  competitor_pricing_data_brave:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent competitor pricing data from Brave search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, price, product, date]"
      - "no_empty_values: [competitor_name, price, product]"

  competitor_pricing_data_duckduckgo:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent competitor pricing data from DuckDuckGo search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, price, product, date]"
      - "no_empty_values: [competitor_name, price, product]"

  combined_pricing_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine competitor pricing data from both sources into a unified table"
    type: table
    inputs: [competitor_pricing_data_brave, competitor_pricing_data_duckduckgo]
    checks:
      - "row_count == competitor_pricing_data_brave.row_count + competitor_pricing_data_duckduckgo.row_count"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, price, product, date]"
      - "no_null_values: [competitor_name, price]"

  validated_pricing_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined pricing data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_pricing_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_pricing_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "price >= 0"
      - "date is valid"

  pricing_trend_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Train a machine learning model to predict future pricing trends"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_pricing_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [competitor_name, price, date]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  pricing_analysis_report:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual report summarizing the pricing analysis"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_pricing_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

    description: "Reshape unstructured feedback text into structured table format"
    type: table
    inputs: [customer_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [customer_id, feedback_text, category, sentiment_score]"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"

  analyzed_sentiment_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze feedback data to extract sentiment trends and create a model"
    type: model
    inputs: [extracted_feedback_table]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [category, sentiment_score]"

  validated_feedback_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean sentiment analysis results"
    type: table
    inputs: [extracted_feedback_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= extracted_feedback_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [customer_id, category, sentiment_score]"

  comprehensive_feedback_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine validated feedback data and analysis model into a comprehensive report"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data, analyzed_sentiment_model]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [category, average_sentiment, feedback_count]"

  feedback_visualization_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual artifact showing sentiment trends by category"
    type: image
    inputs: [comprehensive_feedback_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, review_text, rating, product_id]"
      - "no_null_values: [review_id, review_text, rating]"

  additional_reviews_data:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent

    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, review_text, rating, product_id]"

  combined_reviews_data:

    checks:

    agent: ReviewerAgent

    type: table
    inputs: [combined_reviews_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_reviews_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "valid_sentiment_scores: [-1, 0, 1]" 

  sentiment_summary_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent

    type: image
    inputs: [validated_sentiments_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"

      - "dimensions: [800, 600]"

    type: table
    inputs: [validated_sentiments_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary_id, sentiment_summary, actionable_insights]"

      - "no_empty_values: [content]"

  combined_article_insights:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine insights from articles and documents into a comprehensive summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [climate_change_articles, retrieved_documents]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary, source]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  validated_insights:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate the combined insights for accuracy and relevance"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_article_insights]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_article_insights.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  climate_trends_chart:

    description: "Create a visual representation of climate change trends from validated insights"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_insights]
    checks:

      - "format: png"

    agent: BashAgent
    description: "Generate final report with visualizations and insights"
    type: text
    inputs: [validated_insights, climate_trends_chart]
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [report_content]"
      - "report_length > 2000"

  sales_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract sales data related to the product launch from the database"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [product_id, sale_date, sale_amount]"
      - "sale_amount >= 0"
      - "no_null_values: [product_id, sale_date]"

  validated_sales_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean sales data for outliers and inconsistencies"
    type: table
    inputs: [sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= sales_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "sale_amount between 0 and 1000000"

  comprehensive_insights:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine sentiment analysis results with validated sales data to generate comprehensive insights"
    type: table
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results, validated_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [sentiment_score, sale_amount, product_id]"
      - "no_null_values: [product_id]"

  insights_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualizations highlighting key trends from the comprehensive insights"
    type: image
    inputs: [comprehensive_insights]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "format: png"
      - "dimensions: [width >= 800, height >= 600]"

    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [customer_id, sale_date, sale_amount, product_id]"
      - "sale_amount >= 0"
      - "no_null_values: [customer_id, sale_date]"

  validated_feedback_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate feedback data against sales data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [structured_feedback_table, sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= structured_feedback_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "sentiment in ['positive', 'neutral', 'negative']"

  insights_summary:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine validated feedback and sales data into insights summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data, sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight, recommendation]"
      - "no_null_values: [insight]"

  insights_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of insights and trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [insights_summary]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive market research report on the latest trends in AI technology by gathering data from various online sources, analyzing industry reports, extracting key insights, validating them, and presenting the findings in a structured format with visualizations for stakeholder presentation."
workflow_yaml:
assets:

    description: "Extract latest trends in AI technology from DuckDuckGo search results"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  brave_ai_insights:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Gather comprehensive insights on AI technology trends from Brave search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  combined_ai_insights:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine insights from multiple URLs into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [ai_market_trends_data, brave_ai_insights]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary, url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary, url]"

  extracted_industry_reports:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve significant chunks from relevant industry reports"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "length > 1000"
      - "no_empty_text: true"

  structured_industry_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform extracted industry reports into structured tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [extracted_industry_reports]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [report_section, data_value]"
      - "no_empty_values: [report_section]"

  validated_combined_insights:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined insights for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_ai_insights]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_ai_insights.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  ai_trends_model:

    type: model
    inputs: [structured_industry_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [report_section, data_value]"

  comprehensive_market_report:

    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [report_summary, recommendations]"
      - "no_empty_values: [report_summary]"

  market_trends_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of AI market trends for stakeholder presentation"
    type: image
    inputs: [comprehensive_market_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive market research report on electric vehicles, pulling the latest statistics from various databases, extracting insights from top research papers, validating the findings, and visualizing trends to present to the board."

scenario: "Gather and analyze customer feedback from various online platforms for our new product launch, validate the sentiment trends, and create a comprehensive report with visualizations that highlight key insights and recommendations."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  customer_feedback_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract customer feedback from DuckDuckGo search results"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [feedback_id, feedback_text, source_url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_id, feedback_text]"

  external_feedback_data:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract additional customer feedback from Brave search results"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [feedback_id, feedback_text, source_url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_id, feedback_text]"

  combined_feedback_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine feedback from different sources into a unified table"
    type: table
    inputs: [customer_feedback_data, external_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= customer_feedback_data.row_count + external_feedback_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [feedback_id, feedback_text, source_url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_id, feedback_text]"

  sentiment_analysis_results:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Analyze feedback text to extract sentiment scores"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count == combined_feedback_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [feedback_id, sentiment_score]"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"

  validated_sentiment_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate sentiment analysis results for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= sentiment_analysis_results.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [sentiment_score]"

  sentiment_trend_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a machine learning model to predict sentiment trends"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_sentiment_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [feedback_id, sentiment_score]"

  sentiment_trend_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual representation of sentiment trends over time"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_sentiment_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [800, 600]"

  comprehensive_feedback_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive report summarizing insights and recommendations"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_sentiment_data, sentiment_trend_chart]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 1"
      - "columns: [insight, recommendation]"
      - "no_empty_values: [insight, recommendation]"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive analysis of customer feedback from multiple sources, including sentiment extraction from recent survey responses, trend identification in social media mentions, and summarized insights into a report that features visualizations of key patterns and recommendations for product improvements."

      - "no_empty_values: [platform, mention]"

  sentiment_analysis_results:

    inputs: [customer_feedback_survey_responses]
    checks:

      - "columns: [response_id, sentiment_score]"

    checks:
      - "row_count = sentiment_analysis_results.row_count + customer_feedback_social_media_mentions.row_count"

    inputs: [combined_feedback_analysis]
    checks:

    inputs: [validated_feedback_analysis]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"

      - "format: png"

  final_feedback_report:
    agent: BashAgent
    description: "Generate final report with visualizations and insights"
    type: text
    inputs: [feedback_visualization_chart]
    checks:
      - "length > 1000"
      - "contains: [summary, recommendations]"

    description: "Synthesize findings into a comprehensive report"
    type: table
    inputs: [analyzed_user_feedback, market_research_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight, source, relevance_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [insight, source]"

  insights_summary:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine URL content into structured summaries for insights"
    type: table
    inputs: [market_research_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary, source_url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  visual_insights_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual summaries of insights for product strategy meeting"
    type: image
    inputs: [synthesized_report, insights_summary]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather user feedback from various surveys and documents, analyze the sentiment and key themes across the responses, create a training dataset for a machine learning model, and produce an interactive dashboard visualizing the insights by demographic segments."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  user_feedback_documents:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract relevant chunks from user survey documents"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"
  
  user_feedback_data:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather user feedback from various surveys"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback]"
  
  combined_feedback_text:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine user feedback and retrieved document chunks into structured text"
    type: table
    inputs: [user_feedback_documents, user_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 3"
      - "columns: [feedback, source]"
  
  cleaned_feedback_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Reshape unstructured user feedback into a structured table"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_feedback_text]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [feedback_id, feedback_text, source]"
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_text]"
  
  validated_feedback_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Analyze and validate the cleaned user feedback data"
    type: table
    inputs: [cleaned_feedback_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= cleaned_feedback_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_text]"
  
  sentiment_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a machine learning model to analyze sentiment from feedback"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [feedback_text]"
  
  sentiment_insights_table:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive table of sentiment insights from user feedback"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data, sentiment_analysis_model]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [sentiment, theme, feedback_count]"
  
  demographic_analysis_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual dashboard to display sentiment insights by demographic segments"
    type: image
    inputs: [sentiment_insights_table]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market analysis for our new product launch by gathering recent competitor data from web searches, extracting relevant insights from industry reports, validating the findings, and synthesizing this information into a detailed report with visualizations of market trends and potential customer segments."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  competitor_data_from_brave:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Gather recent competitor data using Brave web search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_name, market_share]"
      - "no_empty_values: [competitor_name, product_name]"

  competitor_data_from_duckduckgo:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Gather additional competitor insights using DuckDuckGo search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_name, pricing]"
      - "no_empty_values: [competitor_name, product_name]"

  combined_competitor_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine competitor data from multiple sources into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [competitor_data_from_brave, competitor_data_from_duckduckgo]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 10"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_name, market_share, pricing]"
      - "no_empty_values: [competitor_name, product_name]"

  industry_report_extractions:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract relevant insights from industry reports"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [insight_text]"

  validated_industry_insights:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean insights from industry reports"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_competitor_data, industry_report_extractions]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_competitor_data.row_count * 0.9"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_name, insights]"
      - "no_empty_values: [insights]"

  market_analysis_summary:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Create a comprehensive market analysis summary report"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_industry_insights]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary_text, analysis_date]"

  market_trends_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of market trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [market_analysis_summary]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

  customer_segments_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of potential customer segments"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_industry_insights]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive market research report by gathering the latest industry trends from various online sources, extracting relevant data from our internal database, validating the findings, and creating a series of visualizations to present the insights."
workflow_yaml:
assets:

    description: "Extract latest market research trends from DuckDuckGo"

      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [trend_title, trend_description, source_url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend_title, source_url]"

  brave_search_trends:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Gather additional market trends from Brave Search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [trend_title, trend_description, source_url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend_title, source_url]"

  combined_market_trends:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine trends from various sources into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [market_research_trends, brave_search_trends]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 15"
      - "columns: [trend_title, trend_description, source_url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend_title, source_url]"

  internal_data_extraction:
    agent: SqlAgent

      - "row_count > 0"

      - "no_null_values: [internal_metric]"

  validated_market_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent

    checks:

      - "no_invalid_values: [trend_title, internal_metric]"

  market_insights_model:

    type: model
    inputs: [validated_market_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [internal_metric, trend_related]"

  visualization_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent

    type: table
    inputs: [validated_market_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [metric_name, trend_value]"
      - "no_null_values: [metric_name, trend_value]"

  market_trends_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representations of market trends and insights"
    type: image
    inputs: [visualization_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [width: 1920, height: 1080]"

      - "no_empty_values: [trend_title, url]"

  comprehensive_report:

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive market research report on emerging trends in renewable energy, extracting and analyzing data from various online sources, databases, and industry documents, then visualize the findings with clear graphs and charts."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  market_research_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract market research data on renewable energy trends from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 10"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet, date]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  brave_market_trends:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract emerging trends from Brave search results"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 8"
      - "columns: [trend, source, relevance_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend, source]"

  document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Pull relevant chunks from industry documents on renewable energy"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "length > 500"
      - "no_empty_chunks: true"

  combined_market_data:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine market research data and trends into a comprehensive summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [market_research_data, brave_market_trends]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [trend, details, source]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend, details]"

  structured_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Reshape document chunks into structured table format for analysis"
    type: table
    inputs: [document_chunks]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [section, content]"
      - "no_null_values: [section]"

  validated_combined_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined market data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_market_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_market_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend, details]"

  analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze data to identify patterns and create ML model for market predictions"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_combined_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [trend, details]"

  visualizations:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual artifacts from validated combined market data"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_combined_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

  final_report:
    agent: BashAgent
    description: "Compile all visualizations and data into a final market research report"
    type: text
    inputs: [visualizations, validated_combined_data]
    checks:
      - "length > 1000"
      - "contains: [summary, visualizations, conclusions]"

      - "minimum_responses: 10"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market analysis by gathering recent competitor pricing data from multiple sources, structuring it into a comparison table, validating the information, and generating visualizations to aid in strategic decision-making."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  competitor_pricing_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent competitor pricing data from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_name, price, date_collected]"
      - "price >= 0"
      - "no_null_values: [competitor_name, product_name]"

  additional_pricing_data:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract additional competitor pricing data from Brave Search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_name, price, date_collected]"
      - "price >= 0"
      - "no_null_values: [competitor_name, product_name]"

  combined_pricing_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine competitor pricing data into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [competitor_pricing_data, additional_pricing_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= competitor_pricing_data.row_count + additional_pricing_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_name, price, date_collected]"
      - "price >= 0"

  validated_pricing_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean the combined competitor pricing data"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_pricing_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_pricing_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "price between 0 and 10000"

  pricing_trend_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze pricing data to extract trends and create a model"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_pricing_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [competitor_name, product_name, price]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  pricing_comparison_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual comparison chart of competitor pricing trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_pricing_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "format: png"
      - "dimensions: [width: 800, height: 600]"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market research analysis for our new product launch by gathering the latest industry reports and web articles, extracting relevant data, validating the findings against our internal database, and creating a summarized report with visualizations that highlight key trends and competitive insights."
workflow_yaml:
assets:

    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract the latest industry reports from DuckDuckGo search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, summary]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  web_articles_data:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract relevant web articles for market analysis"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, content]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  combined_web_content:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine content from industry reports and web articles"
    type: table
    inputs: [industry_reports_data, web_articles_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count == industry_reports_data.row_count + web_articles_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [title, url, content]"

  extracted_text_data:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract relevant text content from combined web content"
    type: text
    inputs: [combined_web_content]
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"

  structured_data_table:

    description: "Reshape unstructured text data into structured table format"
    type: table

    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [keyword, frequency]"

  validated_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent

    type: table
    inputs: [structured_data_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= structured_data_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "frequency >= 0"

  market_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze validated data to create a market analysis prediction model"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [keyword, frequency]"

  market_analysis_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent

    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight, recommendation]"
      - "no_empty_values: [insight]"

  market_trends_visualization:

    checks:

      - "format: png"

      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [brand, model, features, consumer_rating]"
      - "no_null_values: [brand, model, features]"

  additional_trends_data:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract additional smartphone trends data from Brave search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [brand, model, features, consumer_rating]"
      - "no_null_values: [brand, model, features]"

  combined_trends_data:

    description: "Combine data from various URLs for comprehensive smartphone trends"
    type: table
    inputs: [smartphone_trends_data, additional_trends_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= smartphone_trends_data.row_count + additional_trends_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [brand, model, features, consumer_rating]"

    checks:

    type: model
    inputs: [consumer_feature_patterns]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [feature, frequency]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  trends_report_summary:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive report summarizing trends analysis"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_combined_trends, trends_prediction_model]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"

      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"

      - "format: png"

      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [feature, value]"

  final_insights_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Synthesize insights from validated results into a comprehensive report"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_combined_results, structured_data_from_text]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 5"
      - "columns: [insight, details]"

  insights_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representations of the insights report"
    type: image
    inputs: [final_insights_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "format: png"
      - "dimensions: [width: 1920, height: 1080]"

scenario: "Gather insights from recent articles on climate change by searching both DuckDuckGo and Brave, pull relevant data from a specified set of documents, analyze trends to create a predictive model, and present the findings through interactive visualizations."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  duckduckgo_search_results:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent articles on climate change from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  brave_search_results:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent articles on climate change from Brave"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant text chunks from specified document collection"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_chunks: true"

  combined_search_results:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine search results from both DuckDuckGo and Brave into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [duckduckgo_search_results, brave_search_results]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 10"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"

  trend_analysis_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Analyze trends in articles to reshape data into structured tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_search_results, document_chunks]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [date, keyword_frequency, article_count]"
      - "no_null_values: [date]"

  predictive_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a predictive model based on analyzed trends"
    type: model
    inputs: [trend_analysis_table]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [date, keyword_frequency, article_count]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  trend_visualization_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Generate a visualization of the predictive model findings"
    type: image
    inputs: [predictive_model]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather user feedback from the website"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_text]"
      - "max_length: 500"

  combined_feedback:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine social media and website feedback into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [social_media_feedback, website_feedback]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [user_id, feedback_text, source]"
      - "no_null_values: [user_id, feedback_text]"

  past_customer_satisfaction:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract past customer satisfaction survey results from the database"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [survey_id, satisfaction_score, feedback_text]"
      - "satisfaction_score between 1 and 5"

  validated_combined_feedback:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined feedback for consistency"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_feedback]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_feedback.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [user_id, feedback_text]"

  insights_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze feedback data to extract patterns and create insights model"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_combined_feedback]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [user_id, feedback_text]"

  insights_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate comprehensive insights report based on validated feedback"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_combined_feedback, past_customer_satisfaction]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight, trend, recommendation]"

  insights_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualizations for key insights and trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [insights_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market analysis on electric vehicles by pulling the latest sales data from our database, retrieving recent industry reports from multiple online sources, validating the findings, and then generating visual summaries to present trends and forecasts."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  electric_vehicle_sales_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract latest electric vehicle sales data from the sales database"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [vehicle_id, sale_date, amount, customer_id]"
      - "amount >= 0"
      - "no_null_values: [vehicle_id, sale_date]"

  industry_reports_text:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve recent industry reports from multiple online sources"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"
      - "contains_keywords: [electric vehicles, market analysis]"

  validated_sales_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean electric vehicle sales data for outliers"
    type: table
    inputs: [electric_vehicle_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= electric_vehicle_sales_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "amount between 0 and 1000000"

  combined_industry_reports:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine multiple industry reports into a comprehensive summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [industry_reports_text]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 1"
      - "columns: [summary, source, date]"

  analyzed_sales_data_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze validated sales data to create an ML model for forecasting"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [sale_date, amount, customer_id]"

  sales_trend_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualization of sales trends over time"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

  final_market_analysis_report:
    agent: ToolAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive market analysis report in JSON format"
    type: json
    inputs: [combined_industry_reports, analyzed_sales_data_model, sales_trend_visualization]
    checks:
      - "valid_json: true"
      - "required_keys: [sales_trends, industry_summary, model_performance]"

      - "columns: [review_id, customer_id, product_id, rating, comment]"
