      - "no_null_values: [review_id, customer_id, product_id]"

  competitor_review_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract competitor reviews from the competitor database"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, competitor_id, rating, comment]"
      - "rating between 1 and 5"
      - "no_null_values: [review_id, competitor_id]"

  feedback_themes:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract key themes and sentiments from product reviews"
    type: text
    inputs: [product_review_data]
    checks:
      - "length > 0"

  comparative_analysis:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate comparative analysis of customer feedback against competitors"
    type: table
    inputs: [product_review_data, competitor_review_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [theme, product_rating, competitor_rating, comments]"
      - "no_null_values: [theme]"

  validated_analysis:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate the comparative analysis for consistency and accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [comparative_analysis]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= comparative_analysis.row_count * 0.95"
      - "valid_ratings: [product_rating, competitor_rating]"

  visualization_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual representation of the comparative analysis"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_analysis]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather recent news articles about renewable energy from multiple sources, analyze the sentiment and key topics within the articles, and create a comprehensive report with visualizations highlighting trends and statistics over the last six months."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  recent_news_articles:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent news articles about renewable energy"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [title, url, publication_date, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  news_article_texts:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve text content from news articles"
    type: text
    inputs: [recent_news_articles]
    checks:
      - "non_empty_text: true"

  sentiment_analysis_results:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze sentiment of news article texts"
    type: model
    inputs: [news_article_texts]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [text_length, sentiment_score]"

  key_topics_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Extract key topics from news article texts"
    type: table
    inputs: [news_article_texts]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [topic, frequency]"
      - "no_empty_values: [topic]"

  validated_news_articles:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate news articles for relevance and accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_news_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= recent_news_articles.row_count * 0.90"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url, publication_date]"

  comprehensive_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive report with analysis and findings"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_news_articles, sentiment_analysis_results, key_topics_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary, key_insights, sentiment_analysis, topics]"

  trends_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visualizations highlighting trends over the last six months"
    type: image
    inputs: [comprehensive_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Conduct a market research analysis on the latest trends in renewable energy, gather relevant data from various sources including academic papers and search engines, synthesize the findings into structured tables, validate the information, and create an informative report complete with visualizations for our upcoming strategy meeting."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  renewable_energy_search_results:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract latest trends in renewable energy from Brave search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  academic_paper_data:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant sections from academic papers on renewable energy"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"
      - "length > 100"

  combined_academic_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine URL content summaries from academic papers"
    type: table
    inputs: [academic_paper_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 3"
      - "columns: [url, summary]"
      - "no_empty_values: [url, summary]"

  structured_trends_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform unstructured text into a structured table of trends"
    type: table
    inputs: [renewable_energy_search_results, combined_academic_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [trend, source]"
      - "no_null_values: [trend]"

  validated_trends_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean the structured trends data"
    type: table
    inputs: [structured_trends_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= structured_trends_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [trend, source]"

  renewable_energy_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze trends data to create a predictive ML model for renewable energy"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_trends_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [trend, source]"

  final_report_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of renewable energy trends for report"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_trends_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

  final_report:
    agent: BashAgent
    description: "Generate final report for strategy meeting using visualizations and trends data"
    type: text
    inputs: [final_report_visualization, validated_trends_data]
    checks:
      - "length > 500"
      - "contains: [trends, analysis, recommendations]"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market analysis for our new product launch by gathering competitor insights from various online sources, extracting key performance metrics, validating the data, and producing a detailed report with visualizations to illustrate market trends and consumer behavior."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  competitor_insights_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract competitor insights using DuckDuckGo search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, performance_metric, market_share]"
      - "no_null_values: [competitor_name, performance_metric]"

  market_trends_data:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Gather market trend information from Brave search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [trend_name, trend_value, timestamp]"
      - "no_null_values: [trend_name, trend_value]"

  document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant document chunks for deeper insights"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "text_length > 100"
      - "no_empty_chunks: true"

  validated_competitor_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean competitor insights data"
    type: table
    inputs: [competitor_insights_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= competitor_insights_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "valid_values: [performance_metric >= 0]"

  structured_market_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform unstructured market trends data into structured tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [market_trends_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= market_trends_data.row_count * 0.90"
      - "columns: [trend_name, trend_value]"

  combined_insights:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine URL content into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [document_chunks]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [url, summary]"

  comprehensive_analysis:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine validated competitor data and structured market data into comprehensive analysis"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_competitor_data, structured_market_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, market_trend, performance_metric]"

  market_analysis_report:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual report of market analysis with trends and insights"
    type: image
    inputs: [comprehensive_analysis]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather information on the latest trends in renewable energy technologies from various academic journals and online sources, synthesize the key findings into a comprehensive report, validate the data accuracy, and create informative visualizations to illustrate the trends."
workflow_yaml:
assets:

    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract information on renewable energy technologies from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  academic_journal_data:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant text chunks from academic journals"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "non_empty_text: true"

  combined_journal_text:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine text from various academic journals into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [academic_journal_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary, source]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  validated_renewable_energy_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and ensure the quality of extracted renewable energy data"
    type: table
    inputs: [renewable_energy_journal_data, combined_journal_text]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= renewable_energy_journal_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [title, url, summary]"

  trend_analysis_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Analyze and reshape validated data into structured tables for trends"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_renewable_energy_data]

  renewable_energy_trend_model:

    description: "Create a machine learning model to predict trends in renewable energy"
    type: model
    inputs: [trend_analysis_table]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [year, technology_type]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  comprehensive_trend_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Synthesize findings into a comprehensive report on renewable energy trends"

    inputs: [validated_renewable_energy_data, trend_analysis_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [report_summary, insights]"
      - "no_empty_values: [report_summary]"

    type: image
    inputs: [trend_analysis_table]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive market research report on renewable energy trends by gathering the latest articles and studies, analyzing statistical data from our internal database, and creating visual representations of key insights and projections for our stakeholders."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  latest_articles_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract the latest articles on renewable energy from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [title, url, published_date, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  relevant_studies_data:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant studies on renewable energy trends"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "non_empty: true"

  internal_statistical_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract internal statistical data related to renewable energy"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [year, energy_source, production, consumption]"
      - "no_null_values: [year, energy_source]"
      - "valid_ranges: [production >= 0, consumption >= 0]"

  combined_articles_summary:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine URL content from articles into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [latest_articles_data, relevant_studies_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [summary, source]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  structured_statistical_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Reshape statistical data into structured tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [internal_statistical_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [year, energy_source, structured_production, structured_consumption]"
      - "no_null_values: [year, energy_source]"

  validated_combined_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined articles and statistical data"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_articles_summary, structured_statistical_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= minimum_combined_records"
      - "no_duplicates: true"

  renewable_energy_insights_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a model analyzing renewable energy trends"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_combined_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [year, energy_source, structured_production, structured_consumption]"

  insights_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representations of insights and projections"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_combined_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market analysis by gathering recent online reviews from various platforms, extracting insights on customer sentiment, training a machine learning model to identify trends, and presenting the findings in a detailed report with visualizations."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  recent_online_reviews:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent online reviews from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [review_id, platform, sentiment, content]"
      - "no_empty_values: [review_id, platform, sentiment]"

  additional_reviews:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract additional online reviews from Brave Search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [review_id, platform, sentiment, content]"
      - "no_empty_values: [review_id, platform, sentiment]"

  combined_reviews:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine reviews from multiple platforms into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_online_reviews, additional_reviews]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= recent_online_reviews.row_count + additional_reviews.row_count"
      - "columns: [review_id, platform, sentiment, content]"
      - "no_duplicate_values: [review_id]"

  sentiment_analysis_results:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Analyze sentiment data and reshape into structured insights"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_reviews]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [platform, positive_count, negative_count, neutral_count]"
      - "no_empty_values: [platform]"

  sentiment_trend_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Train a machine learning model to predict sentiment trends"
    type: model
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [platform, positive_count, negative_count]"
      - "model_type: classification"

  sentiment_insight_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a sentiment trend visualization based on analysis"
    type: image
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

  comprehensive_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Compile findings into a comprehensive report"
    type: table
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results, sentiment_insight_chart]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [report_section, content]"
      - "no_empty_values: [report_section, content]"

scenario: "Gather feedback from customers through an online survey, analyze the qualitative responses for recurring themes, validate the findings against our sales data, and generate a visual report that highlights key insights and recommendations for product improvements."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  customer_feedback_responses:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather qualitative feedback from customers through an online survey"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback]"
      - "minimum_responses: 10"

  extracted_feedback_data:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract relevant chunks from customer feedback documents"
    type: text
    inputs: [customer_feedback_responses]
    checks:
      - "no_empty_chunks: true"
      - "minimum_chunk_length: 50"

  structured_feedback_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform feedback text into a structured table format"
    type: table
    inputs: [extracted_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [theme, frequency, sentiment]"
      - "no_null_values: [theme]"

  sales_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract sales data from the database for validation"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [product_id, sales_amount, date]"
      - "sales_amount >= 0"

  validated_sales_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean sales data for outliers"
    type: table
    inputs: [sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= sales_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "sales_amount between 0 and 1000000"

  combined_insights_table:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine validated sales data and structured feedback for insights"
    type: table
    inputs: [structured_feedback_table, validated_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [theme, frequency, sales_amount, date]"

  insights_visualization_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual report highlighting key insights and recommendations"
    type: image
    inputs: [combined_insights_table]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather public sentiment analysis on our latest product launch by searching for relevant articles and reviews online, pulling data from our sales records, validating the information, and generating a comprehensive report with visualizations of key trends and customer feedback."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  product_review_articles:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent

    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet, publication_date]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant chunks from product document collections"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "non_empty: true"

  combined_article_summary:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine content from URLs of retrieved articles into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [product_review_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, summary, sentiment_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, summary]"

  sales_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract sales data related to the latest product launch"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [product_id, sale_date, amount, customer_id]"
      - "amount >= 0"
      - "no_null_values: [product_id, sale_date]"

  validated_sales_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean sales data for accuracy and outliers"
    type: table
    inputs: [sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= sales_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "amount between 0 and 1000000"

  sentiment_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a sentiment analysis model from validated sales data"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [customer_id, sale_date, amount]"
      - "model_type: classification"

  sentiment_analysis_results:

    description: "Analyze sentiment scores from combined articles and transform them into structured tables"

    inputs: [combined_article_summary]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_article_summary.row_count * 0.8"
      - "columns: [title, sentiment_score]"

    type: image
    inputs: [comprehensive_sentiment_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive report on recent climate change research by gathering data from various scientific databases and web sources, analyzing the trends and patterns, validating the findings, and presenting the results through interactive visualizations."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  climate_change_research_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract recent climate change research articles from scientific databases"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [title, authors, publication_date, abstract]"
      - "no_null_values: [title, authors, publication_date]"

  web_search_results:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Gather additional climate change information from web sources"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  combined_research_data:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine data from scientific databases and web searches into a comprehensive dataset"
    type: table
    inputs: [climate_change_research_data, web_search_results]
    checks:
      - "row_count == climate_change_research_data.row_count + web_search_results.row_count"
      - "columns: [title, authors, publication_date, abstract, url, snippet]"
      - "no_null_values: [title]"

  cleaned_research_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined research data for accuracy and completeness"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_research_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_research_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_null_values: [title, authors, publication_date]"

  trend_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze research data to identify trends and create a predictive model"
    type: model
    inputs: [cleaned_research_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [publication_date, abstract]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  summarized_trend_data:
    agent: ToolAgent
    description: "Generate summary statistics for the trend analysis model"
    type: json
    inputs: [trend_analysis_model]
    checks:
      - "valid_json: true"
      - "required_keys: [mean_trend, median_trend, confidence_interval]"
      - "mean_trend >= 0"

  visual_trend_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual representation of the climate change trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [cleaned_research_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "format: png"
      - "dimensions: [width: 1200, height: 800]"

  final_report:
    agent: BashAgent
    description: "Compile all findings into a final report document"
    type: text
    inputs: [summarized_trend_data, visual_trend_chart]
    checks:
      - "length > 1000"
      - "contains: [summary, visualizations, conclusions]"

    inputs: [validated_statistics]
    checks:

      - "columns: [year, summary]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

    type: image
    inputs: [validated_statistics]
    checks:

      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve product reviews from document collections"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "text_length >= 100"
      - "no_empty_reviews: true"

  consumer_sentiment_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract consumer sentiment data from various URLs"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "text_length >= 100"
      - "no_empty_sentiments: true"

  structured_pricing_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform unstructured competitor pricing data into structured tables"

      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_name, price]"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market analysis by retrieving recent competitor data from various sources, synthesizing the findings into structured tables, validating the insights, and creating a detailed visual report highlighting market trends and customer sentiments."
workflow_yaml:
assets:

    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent competitor data from Brave web search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, market_share, sentiment_score]"
      - "no_null_values: [competitor_name, market_share]"

  competitor_data_alternative:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent competitor data from DuckDuckGo search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, market_share, sentiment_score]"
      - "no_null_values: [competitor_name, market_share]"

  combined_competitor_data:

    inputs: [validated_competitor_data]

      - "format: png"
      - "dimensions: [800, 600]"

scenario: "Gather recent articles and research papers on renewable energy technologies, extract relevant data points from these sources, validate the findings, and analyze the data to identify trends and predictions, culminating in an interactive visual report."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  recent_articles:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Gather recent articles on renewable energy technologies"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, publication_date, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  research_papers:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Gather recent research papers on renewable energy"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, publication_date, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  all_articles:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine articles and papers into a structured summary"

    checks:
      - "row_count >= (recent_articles.row_count + research_papers.row_count)"
      - "columns: [title, url, publication_date, snippet]"

  extracted_data_points:

    type: model
    inputs: [validated_data_points]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"

    inputs: [trend_analysis_model]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"

    inputs: [sales_data]

      - "row_count >= sales_data.row_count * 0.95"

      - "row_count > 0"

    checks:

  comprehensive_report_json:

    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Pull additional cybersecurity threats from Brave search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [title, date, description, severity]"
      - "no_null_values: [title, date]"

  combined_threat_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine threat data from multiple URLs into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_cybersecurity_threats, additional_threat_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= recent_cybersecurity_threats.row_count + additional_threat_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [title, date, description, severity]"
      - "no_null_values: [title, date]"

  analyzed_threat_patterns:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze combined threat data to extract key patterns"
    type: model
    inputs: [combined_threat_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [severity, description]"
      - "model_type: classification"

  validated_threat_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean threat data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_threat_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_threat_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "severity in [low, medium, high]"

  cybersecurity_report_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visualization chart of analyzed cybersecurity threats"
    type: image
    inputs: [validated_threat_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive market analysis report by gathering data from our internal database, pulling relevant industry research papers, extracting key insights from competitor websites, and visualizing trends in customer behavior over the past year."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  internal_database_sales_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract sales data from internal database for market analysis"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [transaction_id, product_id, sale_date, amount, customer_id]"
      - "amount >= 0"
      - "no_null_values: [transaction_id, product_id, sale_date]"

  industry_research_text:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve relevant industry research papers for insights"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "length > 500"
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"

  competitor_web_data:
    agent: UrlAgent
    description: "Fetch competitor insights from their websites"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "length > 300"
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"

  validated_sales_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean sales data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [internal_database_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= internal_database_sales_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "amount between 0 and 1000000"

  key_insights_table:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Compile key insights from industry research and competitor data"
    type: table
    inputs: [industry_research_text, competitor_web_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight_id, source, summary]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  structured_customer_behavior_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Reshape customer behavior data into structured format"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [customer_id, behavior_metric, metric_value]"
      - "metric_value >= 0"

  market_analysis_report:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine all insights and data into a comprehensive market analysis report"
    type: table
    inputs: [key_insights_table, structured_customer_behavior_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [report_id, section, content]"
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"

  customer_behavior_trend_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Visualize trends in customer behavior over the past year"
    type: image
    inputs: [structured_customer_behavior_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Compile a comprehensive market analysis report on electric vehicle trends by searching recent articles from the web and aggregating data from various sources, then synthesize the findings into structured tables, validate the information, and create visual summaries to present to the stakeholders."

workflow_yaml:

    agent: UserInputAgent

      - "no_null_values: [feedback_text]"
      - "feedback_text_length > 0"

  extracted_feedback_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Transform unstructured user feedback into structured table format"

    inputs: [user_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [user_id, feedback_text, submission_date]"
      - "no_null_values: [user_id, feedback_text]"

  analyzed_feedback_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze feedback data to extract common themes and build a model"
    type: model
    inputs: [extracted_feedback_table]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [theme, sentiment]"
      - "model_type: classification"

  validated_feedback_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and ensure quality of analyzed feedback data"
    type: table
    inputs: [extracted_feedback_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= extracted_feedback_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "columns: [user_id, feedback_text, submission_date, theme]"
      - "no_null_values: [user_id, theme]"

  historical_validation_data:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Retrieve historical data for validation against current feedback findings"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_null_values: [historical_context]"
      - "historical_context_length > 0"

  validated_insights_table:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine validated feedback and historical data to generate actionable insights"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data, historical_validation_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"

      - "no_null_values: [insight_description]"

    type: image
    inputs: [validated_insights_table]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market analysis for our new product by gathering customer sentiment from social media, validating the findings against sales data, creating predictive models for market trends, and presenting the results in a detailed report with visualizations."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  social_media_sentiment_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract customer sentiment data from social media platforms"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [user_id, sentiment_score, post_content, timestamp]"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"
      - "no_null_values: [user_id, sentiment_score]"

  customer_sales_data:
    agent: SqlAgent
    description: "Extract customer purchase history from sales database"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [customer_id, purchase_date, amount, product_id]"
      - "amount >= 0"
      - "no_null_values: [customer_id, purchase_date]"

  validated_sentiment_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean sentiment data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [social_media_sentiment_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= social_media_sentiment_data.row_count * 0.90"
      - "no_null_values: [user_id, sentiment_score]"

  combined_customer_data:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine validated sentiment data with customer sales data"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_sentiment_data, customer_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count == validated_sentiment_data.row_count + customer_sales_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [customer_id, sentiment_score, purchase_date, amount]"

  market_trend_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create predictive model for market trends based on combined data"
    type: model
    inputs: [combined_customer_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [sentiment_score, amount]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  market_analysis_report:
    agent: ToolAgent
    description: "Generate a detailed market analysis report"
    type: json
    inputs: [market_trend_model]
    checks:
      - "valid_json: true"
      - "required_keys: [summary, insights, recommendations]"

  revenue_trend_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create revenue trend visualization from customer sales data"
    type: image
    inputs: [customer_sales_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "format: png"

  comprehensive_market_analysis:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine all findings into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [market_analysis_report, revenue_trend_chart]
    checks:
      - "row_count == 2"
      - "columns: [report_summary, visual_representation]"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive analysis of customer feedback from multiple sources, including our internal database and recent online reviews, validate the insights, and generate a detailed report with visualizations that highlight sentiment trends and key themes."

      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_text, rating]"

  internal_feedback_data:

      - "row_count > 0"

  combined_feedback_data:

    description: "Combine online reviews and internal feedback into a unified dataset"

    inputs: [validated_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"

    description: "Generate a comprehensive report summarizing customer feedback insights"

    checks:
      - "row_count >= 1"
      - "columns: [summary_id, insights, visualization_link]"

      - "row_count >= extracted_feedback_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback_text]"
      - "valid_date_range: feedback_date"

  sentiment_prediction_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze feedback data to develop a machine learning model for sentiment prediction"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [customer_id, feedback_text]"
      - "model_type: classification"

  sentiment_analysis_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine analyzed feedback data and model predictions into a comprehensive report"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_feedback_data, sentiment_prediction_model]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [customer_id, sentiment_score, feedback_text]"

  feedback_trends_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of customer feedback trends based on sentiment analysis"
    type: image
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Gather customer feedback from various online platforms, analyze the sentiments in the reviews, create a comprehensive report summarizing key insights, and visualize trends over time."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  customer_feedback_data:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract customer feedback from DuckDuckGo search results"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, feedback, rating, platform]"
      - "no_empty_values: [review_id, feedback, platform]"

  additional_feedback_data:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Extract additional customer feedback from Brave search results"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [review_id, feedback, rating, platform]"
      - "no_empty_values: [review_id, feedback, platform]"

  combined_feedback_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine feedback from various online platforms into a structured summary"
    type: table
    inputs: [customer_feedback_data, additional_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= customer_feedback_data.row_count + additional_feedback_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [review_id, feedback, rating, platform]"
      - "no_empty_values: [review_id, feedback]"

  sentiment_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Analyze feedback data to extract sentiment patterns and create a sentiment analysis model"
    type: model
    inputs: [combined_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [feedback, rating]"
      - "model_type: classification"

  sentiment_analysis_results:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate sentiment analysis results for accuracy and consistency"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_feedback_data.row_count * 0.90"
      - "valid_sentiment: [positive, negative, neutral]"

  comprehensive_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive report summarizing key insights from feedback analysis"
    type: table
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary_id, insight, sentiment, recommendation]"
      - "no_empty_values: [insight]"

  trends_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual representation of sentiment trends over time"
    type: image
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_results]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"
      - "format: png"

scenario: "Conduct a comprehensive market analysis by gathering recent articles and reports from various sources, extracting relevant data on industry trends, synthesizing the information into structured tables, validating the findings, and creating a visually engaging presentation to showcase insights and forecasts."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  recent_articles:
    agent: DuckDuckGoSearchAgent
    description: "Extract recent articles on market trends from DuckDuckGo"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [title, url, publication_date, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  industry_trends_data:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Gather industry trends data from Brave search"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count > 10"
      - "columns: [trend, description, relevance_score]"
      - "no_empty_values: [trend]"

  combined_trends_articles:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine articles and trends data into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [recent_articles, industry_trends_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count == recent_articles.row_count + industry_trends_data.row_count"
      - "columns: [title, trend, description, url]"

  validated_combined_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate combined trends and articles data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_trends_articles]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_trends_articles.row_count * 0.95"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, trend]"

  structured_market_analysis:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Reshape validated data into structured tables for analysis"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_combined_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [trend, description, count]"

  market_analysis_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a predictive model based on structured market analysis data"
    type: model
    inputs: [structured_market_analysis]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [trend, count]"

  market_insights_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual representation of market insights"
    type: image
    inputs: [structured_market_analysis]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

  final_market_analysis_report:
    agent: BashAgent
    description: "Generate a final market analysis report with visual insights"
    type: text
    inputs: [market_insights_chart, validated_combined_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 10MB"
      - "contains: 'Market Analysis Report'"
      - "no_empty_values: [content]"

    inputs: [analyzed_themes]
    checks:

  comprehensive_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Create a comprehensive report of validated themes"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_themes]
    checks:

    checks:

      - "dimensions: [width: 800, height: 600]"

    checks:

      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"

      - "columns: [competitor_name, product_offering, price, features]"
      - "no_empty_values: [competitor_name, product_offering]"

  search_results_summary:
    agent: BraveSearchAgent
    description: "Summarize search results from Brave search API"
    type: table
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 5"
      - "columns: [title, url, snippet]"
      - "no_empty_values: [title, url]"

  combined_feedback_data:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Combine user feedback into comprehensive insights"
    type: table
    inputs: [user_feedback_data, search_results_summary]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight, feedback_summary]"

  validated_competitive_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean competitive analysis data"
    type: table
    inputs: [competitive_analysis_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= competitive_analysis_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "price >= 0"

  trend_analysis_data:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Analyze trends from validated competitive data"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_competitive_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [trend, percentage_growth]"

  market_trends_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Create a machine learning model for market trend predictions"
    type: model
    inputs: [trend_analysis_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.80"
      - "required_features: [trend, percentage_growth]"

  market_research_report:
    agent: ToolAgent
    description: "Generate a detailed market research report in JSON format"
    type: json
    inputs: [combined_feedback_data, trend_analysis_data]
    checks:
      - "valid_json: true"
      - "required_keys: [insights, trends, recommendations]"

  market_insight_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of market insights and trends"
    type: image
    inputs: [combined_feedback_data, trend_analysis_data]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

scenario: "Gather user feedback from multiple platforms, analyze the sentiment of the responses, generate a comprehensive report detailing trends and insights, and create visualizations to present findings to the management team."
workflow_yaml:
assets:
  user_feedback_data:
    agent: UserInputAgent
    description: "Gather user feedback from multiple platforms"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [feedback]"
      - "feedback_length <= 1000"

  extracted_feedback_data:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract relevant chunks from feedback documents"
    type: text
    inputs: [user_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [chunk]"
      - "chunk_length <= 500"

  sentiment_analysis_table:
    agent: NumericalSequencesAgent
    description: "Analyze sentiment and reshape data into structured tables"
    type: table
    inputs: [extracted_feedback_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [feedback_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_label]"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"

  validated_sentiment_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate sentiment analysis results for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [sentiment_analysis_table]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= sentiment_analysis_table.row_count * 0.95"
      - "sentiment_score between -1 and 1"

  comprehensive_insight_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate a comprehensive report detailing trends and insights from the validated data"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_sentiment_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [insight_id, trend_description, data_points]"

  insights_summary_chart:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create a visual representation of insights for management"
    type: image
    inputs: [comprehensive_insight_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [1920, 1080]"

  final_report:
    agent: BashAgent
    description: "Compile the insights and visualizations into a final report"
    type: text
    inputs: [comprehensive_insight_report, insights_summary_chart]
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [report_content]"
      - "report_length <= 5000"

  document_chunks:
    agent: DocumentRetrieverAgent
    description: "Extract relevant chunks from market analysis documents"
    type: text
    checks:
      - "no_empty_values: [text_chunk]"
      - "length >= 50"

  combined_competitor_data:
    agent: UrlRetrieverAgent
    description: "Combine competitor data from multiple sources into structured summaries"
    type: table
    inputs: [competitor_data_from_brave, competitor_data_from_duckduckgo]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= 10"
      - "columns: [competitor_name, market_share, url]"
      - "no_empty_values: [competitor_name, market_share]"

  validated_competitor_data:
    agent: ReviewerAgent
    description: "Validate and clean combined competitor data for accuracy"
    type: table
    inputs: [combined_competitor_data]
    checks:
      - "row_count >= combined_competitor_data.row_count * 0.95"
      - "market_share >= 0 and market_share <= 100"

  market_trend_model:
    agent: MleAgent
    description: "Train a machine learning model to predict market trends based on competitor data"
    type: model
    inputs: [validated_competitor_data]
    checks:
      - "accuracy > 0.85"
      - "required_features: [competitor_name, market_share]"
      - "model_type: regression"

  market_analysis_report:
    agent: AnswererAgent
    description: "Generate comprehensive market analysis report based on validated data and model"
    type: table
    inputs: [validated_competitor_data, market_trend_model]
    checks:
      - "row_count > 0"
      - "columns: [summary, insights, recommendations]"
      - "no_empty_values: [summary]"

  market_trend_visualization:
    agent: VisualizationAgent
    description: "Create visual representation of market trends based on analysis report"
    type: image
    inputs: [market_analysis_report]
    checks:
      - "file_size < 5MB"
      - "dimensions: [width: 800, height: 600]"
